psalm: Unless the lord builds the house, the builders labor in vain.
dedicated: The nameless, faceless, and victorious generation that will see the Lord come back to earth and to my miraculous son (now 19 months old) who I believe will be one of them.
porpuse: God’s passionate and deep desire for each of us is
mission: That every act, decision, thought, second, or cent of our lives will be eternally and outrageously rewarded by Jesus.
intro: Foundational Considerations Before Going, Starting or Sending.
name: First name
comments: Tell us what you think of the website.
1photo: Read (or listen to) how God’s sovereign love supernaturally reaches a new believer and births a book.
2photo: Dig a life foundation that never loses focus what Jesus said must be first and great.
3photo: Follow closely Jesus’s detailed blueprint how to build a heart that is continually vibrant with God’s love and purposes.
4photo: Reinforce your faith and trust in God by being fully aware and prepared for Jesus’s future events.
